mean_cn: adv. 不可预见地，不能预料地
mean_en: that cannot be predicted because it changes a lot or depends on too many different things
word_etyma: un不+pre预先+dict断言+ably可...地 → 不可预知地；不定地unpredictably
sentence: The world changes fast and unpredictably; don't worry about tomorrow and live in the moment.
sentence_trans: 世界变化迅速且无常，不要为了明天担心，活在当下吧。
